com.sitewhere.spi.device.event

Interface IDeviceEventManagement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILifecycleComponent, ITenantLifecycleComponent

    public interface IDeviceEventManagement
extends ITenantLifecycleComponent
    Interface for device event management operations.

    • Method Summary
